body_content.explanation: a vote that you do not cast (= make) yourself but that is cast by someone who is representing you and voting according to what you want:
examples: An offence of falsely applying for a postal or proxy vote will be created under laws to combat fraud.
The proxy votes indicate that the rebel shareholders will win comfortably with a 9-1 margin.

body_content.explanation: a system of voting in which you do not vote yourself but have another person represent you and vote according to what you want:
examples: Both men were re-elected by proxy vote.
It's proof that if you work hard with the proxy vote system, you can get the shareholder meetings to go your way.
